title: Iran Rejects Claims Linking Tehran To Hamas' October 7 Attack On Israel
content: Iran's permanent mission to the United Nations in New York rejected claims linking Tehran to Hamas' October 7 surprise attack on Israel, the state media reported.
summary: Iran's permanent mission to the United Nations in New York rejected claims linking Tehran to Hamas' October 7 surprise attack on Israel, the state media reported.

title: Thousands Trapped In Gaza's Jabalia Camp As Israel Continues Deadly Attacks
content: Thousands of people are trapped in Gaza's Jabalia camp as Israeli forces attack the area, Medecins Sans Frontieres (Doctors Without Borders) said on Friday.
summary: Thousands of people are trapped in Gaza's Jabalia camp as Israeli forces attack the area, Medecins Sans Frontieres (Doctors Without Borders) said on Friday.

title: Woman Dies After Falling Overboard From Cruise Ship Off Channel Islands
content: Though rescuers retrieved her from the water and rushed her to the hospital, she was pronounced dead.
summary: Though rescuers retrieved her from the water and rushed her to the hospital, she was pronounced dead.

title: First Wave Covid Infections Linked To Higher Heart Attack Risks: Study
content: As per the research, unvaccinated individuals infected with the virus in 2019 and 2020 are at a notably higher risk of experiencing a heart attack or stroke, with this risk lasting for up to three years after infection.
summary: As per the research, unvaccinated individuals infected with the virus in 2019 and 2020 are at a notably higher risk of experiencing a heart attack or stroke, with this risk lasting for up to three years after infection.

title: Kim Jong Un's Sister Warns Of "Horrible Disaster" As A Response To Drones
content: The powerful sister of North Korean leader Kim Jong Un warned Saturday that Seoul would face a "horrible disaster" if unmanned drones reached Pyongyang again, a day after accusing the South of launching such aircraft at the capital.
summary: The powerful sister of North Korean leader Kim Jong Un warned Saturday that Seoul would face a "horrible disaster" if unmanned drones reached Pyongyang again, a day after accusing the South of launching such aircraft at the capital.

title: New Israeli Strikes Outside Hezbollah Strongholds Kill 15, Says Lebanon
content: Lebanon's health ministry said Israeli strikes on three villages outside traditional Hezbollah strongholds had killed at least 15 people Saturday, as state media reported further strikes elsewhere
summary: Lebanon's health ministry said Israeli strikes on three villages outside traditional Hezbollah strongholds had killed at least 15 people Saturday, as state media reported further strikes elsewhere

title: EgyptAir Passenger Severely Injured After Overhead Luggage Falls On Him
content: The bag's impact caused significant harm, including a cracked upper incisor tooth and severe facial injuries.
summary: The bag's impact caused significant harm, including a cracked upper incisor tooth and severe facial injuries.

title: "Champion Of India-Israel Friendship": Netanyahu Condoles Ratan Tata's Death
content: Prime Minister of Israel Benjamin Netanyahu wrote to Narendra Modi today condoling the death of industrialist and global icon Ratan Tata. He said many people in his country are mourning Mr Tata's death.
summary: Prime Minister of Israel Benjamin Netanyahu wrote to Narendra Modi today condoling the death of industrialist and global icon Ratan Tata. He said many people in his country are mourning Mr Tata's death.

title: Kamala Harris Makes Medical Report Public, Claims Trump Refuses To Do So
content: Vice President Kamala Harris, the Democratic presidential nominee, released a letter from her doctor on Saturday that pronounced her in good health and fit for high office, in an effort to draw a contrast with her counterpart, Donald Trump.
summary: Vice President Kamala Harris, the Democratic presidential nominee, released a letter from her doctor on Saturday that pronounced her in good health and fit for high office, in an effort to draw a contrast with her counterpart, Donald Trump.

title: UN Warns of Regional Conflict As Israeli Forces Battle Hezbollah, Hamas
content: UN peacekeepers in Lebanon warned Saturday against a "catastrophic" regional conflict as Israeli forces battled Hezbollah and Hamas militants on two fronts, on the holiest day of the Jewish calendar.
summary: UN peacekeepers in Lebanon warned Saturday against a "catastrophic" regional conflict as Israeli forces battled Hezbollah and Hamas militants on two fronts, on the holiest day of the Jewish calendar.

title: Screaming Delta Passenger Jumps Behind Check-In Counter, Dodges Police
content: The video shows the woman already standing behind the ticket counter. She loudly declares, "Don't trust cops, only trust firemen."
summary: The video shows the woman already standing behind the ticket counter. She loudly declares, "Don't trust cops, only trust firemen."

title: Narendra Modi The "Change-Maker We Need": Former UK PM In Memoir
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi has been written about fondly by former British PM Boris Johnson in his memoir 'Unleashed' which will be available in bookstores in the UK in a few days.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi has been written about fondly by former British PM Boris Johnson in his memoir 'Unleashed' which will be available in bookstores in the UK in a few days.

title: Star Health Faces $68,000 Ransom Demand After Data Leak, Launches Probe
content: Star Health, India's biggest health insurer, on Saturday said it had received a ransom demand of $68,000 from a cyberhacker in connection with a leak of customer data and medical records.
summary: Star Health, India's biggest health insurer, on Saturday said it had received a ransom demand of $68,000 from a cyberhacker in connection with a leak of customer data and medical records.

title: Columbus' Final Resting Place Revealed, Researchers To Confirm Ethnicity
content: While Columbus is traditionally believed to have been from Genoa, Italy, alternative theories suggest he may have been a Spanish Jew, Greek, Basque, or Portuguese.
summary: While Columbus is traditionally believed to have been from Genoa, Italy, alternative theories suggest he may have been a Spanish Jew, Greek, Basque, or Portuguese.

title: "Systematic Pattern Of Desecration": India On Bangladesh Durga Puja Attack
content: India has written to Bangladesh's interim government today expressing "serious concern" over multiple attacks on temples, shrines and puja mandaps or pandals. The attacks include incidents of desecration, vandalism, robbery and defacement.
summary: India has written to Bangladesh's interim government today expressing "serious concern" over multiple attacks on temples, shrines and puja mandaps or pandals. The attacks include incidents of desecration, vandalism, robbery and defacement.

title: Iran Bans Pagers, Walkie Talkies On Flights Following Attacks In Lebanon
content: Iran has banned pagers and walkie-talkies on all flights, local media reported Saturday, weeks after deadly sabotage attacks in Lebanon which were blamed on Israel.
summary: Iran has banned pagers and walkie-talkies on all flights, local media reported Saturday, weeks after deadly sabotage attacks in Lebanon which were blamed on Israel.

title: This Is The World's Shortest Flight, It Lasts Only 1.5 Minutes
content: Operated by Loganair, the flight connects the Orkney islands of Westray and Papa Westray.
summary: Operated by Loganair, the flight connects the Orkney islands of Westray and Papa Westray.

title: 19 Killed In Israeli Strikes As Troops Push Deeper Into Gaza's Northern Enclave
content: Israeli military strikes on Gaza overnight killed at least 19 Palestinians, medics said on Saturday, while forces continued to push deeper into the Jabalia area, where international relief agencies say thousands of people are trapped.
summary: Israeli military strikes on Gaza overnight killed at least 19 Palestinians, medics said on Saturday, while forces continued to push deeper into the Jabalia area, where international relief agencies say thousands of people are trapped.

title: US Forces Strike Islamic State Group In Syria
content: US forces have conducted air strikes against multiple Islamic State group sites in Syria, the military said Saturday.
summary: US forces have conducted air strikes against multiple Islamic State group sites in Syria, the military said Saturday.

title: Hezbollah Says Launched Drone Attack On Base In North Israel's Haifa
content: Hezbollah said Saturday it launched a drone attack on a military base in north Israel's Haifa a day earlier.
summary: Hezbollah said Saturday it launched a drone attack on a military base in north Israel's Haifa a day earlier.
